wissim.controller.filters.gui

Class AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.EditorHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • wissim.controller.filters.gui.AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.EditorHandle
  • Enclosing class:
    AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport

    static class AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.EditorHandle
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to handle an editor. It is very associated to the algorithm used in AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.extractChoices(int, int, int)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean autoOptions
      True if autoOptions is enabled on this editor.
      private java.util.Set choices
      The choices that will be set on the editor.
      (package private) int column
      the model position of the associated editor.
      private java.util.Map<CustomChoice,javax.swing.RowFilter> customChoices
      The choices defined for the editor, with its filter.
      (package private) FilterEditor editor
      The associated FilterEditor.
      private int maxChoices
      The maximum number of choices the editor can have (enums).
      private int maxIterationChoices
      Temporal variable for maxChoices, inside an iteration.
      private java.util.Map<CustomChoice,javax.swing.RowFilter> missingChoices
      On an iteration, the custom choices not yet added.

      • startIteration

        public boolean startIteration(boolean fullMode)
        Starts an iteration in AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.extractChoices(int, int, int).
        Parameters:
        fullMode - set to true if the outcome of the iteration is to set choices to the editor, or false if the outcome is to add choices.
        Returns:
        true if the handle requires no further iteration steps
